Title: Restricts amplified sound from vehicles and requires vehicles with certain modifications to register as a commercial class vehicle
Summary: Restricts amplified sound coming from motor vehicles; requires motor vehicles with certain attachments or modifications to register as a commercial class vehicle.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to restricting amplified sound coming from motor vehicles and requiring motor vehicles with certain attachments or modifications to register as a commercial class vehicle
